short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily inspect your web application stores

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever found yourself working with a web application and you need to keep on interacting with the web storage APIs?

Well, we have made this really easy for you. Storage Snoop has all this handled for you.

We provide access to the most common storage APIs, and the fun part is that you can do all the crud actions you would, but with a neat and easy to use interface
